chapters.title: Chapter 7: Blood Calls Blood
chapters.info: Tigraine Damodred, p. 107 (95)—Daughter-Heir of Andor prior to the Third War of Andoran Succession, after which Morgase took the throne. In fact, it was her disappearance that sparked the war. She fled Caemlyn and was never seen again. She was the first wife of Taringail Damodred, and the mother of Galad. See also Damodred, Galadedrid; Damodred, Taringail; Daughter-Heir (of Andor); Moroso, Gitara; Trakand, Elayne.
